mapper.sql: select tpq.question_id, tq.options, tq.type_id, tq.question_name, tq.right_key, tpt.score from t_paper_question tpq left join t_question tq on tpq.question_id = tq.question_id left join t_paper_type tpt on (tpq.paper_id = tpt.paper_id and tpt.type_id = tq.type_id)
select tpq.paper_id, tpq.question_id, tq.question_id, tq.question_name, tq.options, tq.type_id from t_paper_question tpq left join t_question tq on tpq.question_id = tq.question_id where 1 = 1
